title: Ticket #3211: Color diff is broken
description:
Color diff in gittrac is broken. The filter command was 
GIT_DIR='%RP' /unsup/git/bin/git diff --full-index -t -p -r '%V1' '%V2' -- '%F' | /scratch.2/gittrac/bin/diff2html.py 2>/dev/null

As set in File Diff at https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/setup_diff Likely problem: the diff script was in /scratch.2, and the machine has been moved along with the paths.
remarks:
2012-Aug-27 14:27:25 by adesmet:
/unsup/git/bin/git was no longer valid. Changed to /usr/bin/git.
creator: adesmet
